emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Rev. J. B. Cayce, Corrine Moses, Rev. B. S. Mason, Mrs. L. L. Jefferson, Mrs. Mason, Anna L. Wilson, Rev. W. D. Petett, Alma Illery, and Mary S. Hunt, posed in St. Luke's Church
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 30, 1961, pg. 15, reads: "Rev. Mason's '38th' - Principals who chaired and shared the 38th anniversary celebration of the Rev. B. S. Mason's pastorate at St. Luke Baptist Church, recently are, left to right: the Rev. J. B. Cayce, Mrs. Corrine Moses, Rev. Mr. Mason, the honoree; Mrs. L. L. Jefferson, Mrs. Mason, wife of the honoree; Mrs. Anna L. Wilson, emcee; the Rev. W. D. Petett, AUBA Moderator; Mrs. Alma Illery and Mrs. Mary S. Hunt, program chairman. - Harris photo."
